name: Local Combat
description:
You like fast-paced, competitive and free games? Local Combat is the game you want to play. Featuring 2-player local multiplayer action, player vs AI and thrilling AI vs AI gamemodes, Local Combat is the ultimate local multiplayer shooter experience. And now sit down and have fun.

*****System Requirements*****

  • a working PC
  • a keyboard with some keys
  • a functioning monitor

*****1.2 Changelog*****

  • Support for every resolution
  • Make the game your own with the new config.ini file
  • Minor bugs fixed

Menu Controls

Main Menu [Del]

Exit [Esc]

Music Volume [PageUp/Down]

Music:

Jamie Nord - Universal

Evan King - Moon Base
